name: Air Fryer Fried Okra
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Fried okra made easy in an air fryer without the guilt or mess of using a deep fryer.
ingredients: ½ pound okra pods, cut into 1/2-inch slices
directions: Place egg in a shallow dish and beat; gently stir in sliced okra
Combine cornmeal and flour in a gallon-size resealable plastic bag
Drop 5 slices of okra in the cornmeal mixture, zip the bag, and shake
Remove breaded okra to a plate
Preheat air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place 1/2 the breaded okra slices in the basket of the air fryer and spray with cooking spray
Shake the basket and mist okra with cooking spray again
Shake the basket one last time and cook for 2 minutes
Remove the okra from the basket and salt to taste
